doc:
Paul Wexler (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Wexler_(actor) 0 Paul Goodwin Wexler (May 23, 1929 – November 21, 1979), was an American character actor in feature films and on television for nearly 30 years, from 1950 until 1979. Six-feet-six-inches tall and physically imposing with a long face and deep baritone voice, he specialized in macabre or off-beat roles. Paul_Goodwin_Wexler ( May_23_,_1929 – November_21_,_1979 ) , was an_American_character_actor in feature_films and on television for nearly_30_years , from 1950 until 1979 . Six-feet-six-inches tall and physically_imposing with a_long_face and deep_baritone_voice , he specialized in macabre_or_off-beat_roles .
